  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>74bcceed-e1d8-4262-a854-180b9bb8a05a#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Zikkurat</string>
            <string language="en">Ziggurat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ziggurat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ziggurat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ziggurat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ziggurat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ziggurat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ziggurat</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Zikkurat bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Presenting the ziggurat</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">sumer városok,  sumerok,  akkádok,  Asszíria,  Folyamvölgy,  Ur,  Uruk,  Assur,  Ninive,  Szúza,  Mári,  Óbabiloni Birodalom,  Babilónia,  Eufrátesz,  Tigris,  </string>
            <string language="en">Sumerian cities,  the Sumerians,  Akkads,  Assyria,  river valley,  Ur,  Uruk,  Assur,  Niniveh,  Szúza,  Mari,  Old Babylonian Empire,  Babylonia,  Euphrates,  Tigris,</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellen des ziggurat</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation du ziggurat</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentando o ziggurat</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentare lo ziggurat</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση του ziggurat</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación del ziggurat</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sumerische Städte, das Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, 
River Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, altes Babylonian
Reich, Babylonia, Euphrat, Tigris,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Villes sumériennes, le Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, 
River Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, vieil empire 
babylonien, Babylonia, Euphrate, Tigre,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cidades sumerian, o Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, River 
Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, império babylonian 
velho, Babylonia, Euphrates, Tigris,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Città sumeriche, il Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, River 
Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, vecchio impero 
babylonian, Babylonia, Euphrates, Tigris,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Sumerian πόλεις, το Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, 
κοιλάδα ποταμών, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szϊza, 
Μάρι, παλαιά Babylonian αυτοκρατορία, Babylonia, Εφράτης, 
Τίγρης,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciudades sumerias, el Sumerians, Akkads, Assyria, River
Valley, Ur, Uruk, Assur, Niniveh, Szúza, Mari, viejo imperio 
babilónico, Babylonia, Euphrates, Tigris,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        </educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
